page.title: 09Llanfihangel to Capel Seion
page.content: The majority of the farming families are Welsh speaking with Weslh as their first language. Amongst the 2 communities there are a fair number of English people & Welsh people with English as their first/only language. Probably 70-75% are{totally Welsh speaking. Most of the activities in the Capel Seion area are in Welsh as are all the chapel activities. Llanfihangel tend to be more bi-lingual & church services there alternate weekly between Welsh & English. Llanfihangel have their own village primary school which teaches in both languages with a preferance to Welsh as do most Welsh primary schools Most village activities are organised by the school. At eleven years old children go to either the Welsh or the English Comprehensive schools in Aberystwyth.
